general.title: General
general.pageTagColorTip: Choose a Background Color for Your Tag

customMode.icon: This icon indicates that you are currently using Custom Wallet Mode
customMode.title: Custom Wallet Mode

msg.setAndStoreNameInfo: Name information has been updated and stored.

reg.title: Register {{label}}.eth
reg.tip: The information for the name you want to register is as follows:
reg.wrongReceiver: The Receiver you specified is invalid, please re-enter the Receiver and continue.
reg.register00: {{label}}.eth will be registered to {{owner}} for {{duration}} years.

register11.succeed: SETP 1 / 3 FINISHED: {{label}}.eth commit {{txLink}} confirmed, wait a short time before the next step.
register11.fail: {{label}}.eth COMMIT FAILED. You can check the commit {{txLink}}.

reg.register20: SETP 2 / 3 FINISHED: {{label}}.eth is ready for registration.

register31.fail: {{label}}.eth REGISTRATION FAILED. You can check the registration {{regTxLink}}.

regs.title: Bulk Registration
regs.tip: The information for the names you want to register is as follows:
regs.regsEnded: The bulk registration has been ended.

renew.title: Renew
renew.tip: The information for the name you want to renew is as follows:

renew11.fail: {{label}}.eth RENEWAL FAILED. You can check the renewal {{txLink}}.

renews.title: Bulk Renewal
renews.tip: The information for the names you want to renew is as follows:
renews.renews00: Checked names will be renewed for {{duration}} years.

renews11.fail: The bulk renewal FAILED. You can check the bulk renewal {{txLink}}.

modal.title: Need Confirmation
modal.removeNames: Are you sure to remove in batches?

errorNetwork.title: Unsupported Network
errorNetwork.text: ENSBook currently supports only ethereum Mainnet and Goerli network, please switch network in the wallet you are connected to, or disconnect from the wallet.
